noclick.author: Jared Null
noclick.description: A way to save clicks on any website by allowing a user to harness hover functionality for all user input fields.
noclick.name: noclick

preferences.description: Selects URL box text automatically on hover.
preferences.name: url_focus_enabled
preferences.title: Enable URL Box Auto Selection

preferences.description: Selects search box text automatically on hover.
preferences.name: search_focus_enabled
preferences.title: Enable Search Auto Selection

preferences.description: New Font Text may be easier to see.
preferences.name: font_text_color_preference
preferences.title: Enable Changing Font Color

preferences.description: New Background Color is the easiest to see, but can mess the view of a website, so it's been disabled by default.
preferences.name: element_background_color_preference
preferences.title: Enables Changing Element Background Color

preferences.description: New Boarder Color can make seeing which elements work with NoClick easier.
preferences.name: element_boarder_highlight_preference
preferences.title: Enable Changing Boarder Color

preferences.description: When text is clicked or selected, mouseover will remember without clicking again.
preferences.name: mouseover_selected_text
preferences.title: Enable Saved Clicked Highlight Selection

preferences.description: Enable selecting all text on mouseout.
preferences.name: all_text_select_mouseout
preferences.title: Select All Text on MouseOut

preferences.description: Saves last character as last cursor position.
preferences.name: saved_cursor_postion_on_type
preferences.title: Enable Last typed character selection

preferences.description: Where to always place the cursor?
preferences.name: default_cursor_postion
preferences.title: Select a Cursor Selection Default

preferences.description: Enable color highlighting for all input elements.
preferences.name: boardercolorenable
preferences.title: Enable Element Text Color

preferences.description: Select a background color for all input elements.
preferences.name: BackGroundColor
preferences.title: Element Text Color

preferences.name: ColorTemplate
preferences.title: Color Template Combinations for Element Boarders and Element Text
